headline: Show HN: Zipy.ai - Like Sentry + Hotjar, but with less noise
description:
Hey HN commmunity, Karthik here! Super stoked to announce the launch of Zipy today.

Launching the product that you've been so dearly working on for months is like sending your newborn to school for the first time. Excitement to nervousness, anxiety to thrill, all sorts of emotions hit you at the same time. But the entire team of Zipy is confidently looking forward to the feedback you guys have in store for the beautiful product we’ve built. In community we trust!

Over the past decade, from being a Web Development Intern to a UX Designer and a Product Manager, I have seen the struggles that both Frontend Dev and Product teams face in terms of understanding user behavior and debugging customer issues. Web technologies evolved significantly, but the debugging process still remained in the stone age. With Zipy, we are trying to change this.

Zipy is a product that is primarily of the developers, by the developers and for the developers, essentially built to scratch our own itch, and thus, we've carefully handcrafted various workflows specifically for engineering, product, and support teams. We have been extremely lucky to get support from a bunch of awesome early adopters and partners, who were instrumental in carving our product experience. Hope you all find Zipy very useful. Please give it a try and do share your feedback here: https://app.zipy.ai/sign-up

Check out our Website: https://zipy.ai Quick 15 minute Live Demo: https://calendly.com/d/crv-vpv-p7c/quickzipydemo Join our Discord Server: https://discord.com/invite/7595RKftFY

Benefits of using Zipy: Install in a minute VueJS, React, Angular, Ember, and any javascript web app support ▶ Replay customer sessions with errors in real-time Dev tools with Stack Trace, Console Logs, and Network Request Response details Search error sessions by customer name, URL, email ID, and more. Easy Slack Integration and Alerting

Special Coupon for HN Community: 'ZIPYPH1MONTH' for a FREE 1 month access to our Startup Plan.

Looking forward to your feedback and support.

Fix what matters, Karthik and Team Zipy.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Zipy.ai - 就像Sentry + Hotjar，但噪音较小
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Zipy.ai - 就像Sentry + Hotjar，但噪音較小
description_zh-Hans:
嘿，HN社区，我是Karthik!

推出你为之努力了几个月的产品，就像第一次送新生儿去上学。兴奋到紧张，焦虑到兴奋，各种情绪同时冲击着你。但是，Zipy的整个团队自信地期待着你们对我们所建立的美丽产品的反馈。我们相信社区！

在过去的十年里，从一个网络开发实习生到用户体验设计师和产品经理，我看到了前端开发和产品团队在理解用户行为和调试客户问题方面所面临的困难。网络技术有了很大的发展，但调试过程仍然停留在石器时代。

Zipy是一个主要属于开发者、由开发者提供、为开发者服务的产品，基本上是为了满足我们自己的需求，因此，我们精心为工程、产品和支持团队手工制作了各种工作流程。我们非常幸运地得到了一群很棒的早期采用者和合作伙伴的支持，他们对我们的产品体验起到了重要作用。希望你们都觉得Zipy非常有用。Please give it a try and do share your feedback here: https://app.zipy.ai/sign-up

查看我们的网站。https://zipy.ai 快速的15分钟现场演示。https://calendly.com/d/crv-vpv-p7c/quickzipydemo 加入我们的Discord服务器。https://discord.com/invite/7595RKftFY

使用Zipy的好处。 一分钟内完成安装 支持VueJS、React、Angular、Ember和任何JavaScript网络应用程序 ▶实时回放有错误的客户会话 具有堆栈跟踪、控制台日志和网络请求响应细节的开发工具 通过客户名称、URL、电子邮件ID等搜索错误会话。 轻松的Slack集成和警报

HN社区的特别优惠券："ZIPYPH1MONTH"，可免费使用我们的启动计划一个月。

期待您的反馈和支持。 Karthik和Zipy团队。
description_zh-Hant:
嘿，HN社區，我是Karthik!

推出你為之努力了幾個月的產品，就像第一次送新生兒去上學。興奮到緊張，焦慮到興奮，各種情緒同時衝擊著你。但是，Zipy的整個團隊自信地期待著你們對我們所建立的美麗產品的反饋。我們相信社區！

在過去的十年裡，從一個網絡開發實習生到用戶體驗設計師和產品經理，我看到了前端開發和產品團隊在理解用戶行為和調試客戶問題方面所面臨的困難。網絡技術有了很大的發展，但調試過程仍然停留在石器時代。

Zipy是一個主要屬於開發者、由開發者提供、為開發者服務的產品，基本上是為了滿足我們自己的需求，因此，我們精心為工程、產品和支持團隊手工製作了各種工作流程。我們非常幸運地得到了一群很棒的早期採用者和合作夥伴的支持，他們對我們的產品體驗起到了重要作用。希望你們都覺得Zipy非常有用。Please give it a try and do share your feedback here: https://app.zipy.ai/sign-up

查看我們的網站。https://zipy.ai 快速的15分鐘現場演示。https://calendly.com/d/crv-vpv-p7c/quickzipydemo 加入我們的Discord服務器。https://discord.com/invite/7595RKftFY

使用Zipy的好處。 一分鐘內完成安裝 支持VueJS、React、Angular、Ember和任何JavaScript網絡應用程序 ▶實時回放有錯誤的客戶會話 具有堆棧跟蹤、控制檯日誌和網絡請求響應細節的開發工具 通過客戶名稱、URL、電子郵件ID等搜索錯誤會話。 輕鬆的Slack集成和警報

HN社區的特別優惠券："ZIPYPH1MONTH"，可免費使用我們的啟動計劃一個月。

期待您的反饋和支持。 Karthik和Zipy團隊。
